sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,COUNT ,TRANS_DATE ,TRANS_AMT ,STATUS ,ORDER_ID ,CARD_ID ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_ID ,MER_ORD_ID ,ORDER_MER_ID ,DATE ,SYS_REF_NUM ,SYS_TRA_NUM ,CARD_ID_1 ,RETURN_CODE ,TRANS_TYPE FROM SUS_UNI_ACC WHERE 1=1 AND SUS_UNI_ACC.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(COUNT) Like '%'||(#count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_DATE) Like '%'||(#trans_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) Like '%'||(#trans_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_ID) Like '%'||(#card_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORD_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_ord_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DATE) Like '%'||(#date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_REF_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_ref_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_TRA_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_tra_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_ID_1) Like '%'||(#card_id_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RETURN_CODE) Like '%'||(#return_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUS_UNI_ACC WHERE 1=1 AND SUS_UNI_ACC.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(COUNT) Like '%'||(#count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_DATE) Like '%'||(#trans_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) Like '%'||(#trans_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_ID) Like '%'||(#card_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORD_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_ord_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#order_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DATE) Like '%'||(#date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_REF_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_ref_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SYS_TRA_NUM) Like '%'||(#sys_tra_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_ID_1) Like '%'||(#card_id_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RETURN_CODE) Like '%'||(#return_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
